mentor.disadvantage: If it looks as if they are going to lose a battle, those with the War mentor must pass a Charisma + Willpower (4) Test, or else use all means necessary—including the lives, nuyen, and honor of their teammates—to overcome their adversary.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice pool modifer when casting Combat spells, preparations, and rituals.
Adept: Gain 1 free level of Critical Strike.

mentor.name: Tohu Wa-Bohu
mentor.advantage: All: +2 dice pool modifer for Intimidation or Demolitions tests (choose one)
mentor.disadvantage: Followers gain the Driven quality, in which the focus is the opportunity to destroy something meaningful. Further, they fnd it hard to work in groups given their destructive nature. They can never beneft from teamwork or leadership bonuses.

choice.name: Magician: Gain the Witness My Hate quality for free.
Adept: Gain the Adept Accident power for free.

mentor.name: Green Man
mentor.advantage: All: +2 dice pool modifer for Negotiation Tests.
mentor.disadvantage: When signifcant damage is being done to vegetation, they must pass a Charisma + Willpower (3) Test or use all means possible to stop the destruction.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice pool modifer to summon Plant Spirits.
Adept: Gain 2 free levels of Rooting.

mentor.name: Sun
mentor.advantage: All: +2 dice pool modifer for Perception tests when outside during the day.
mentor.disadvantage: Followers of Sun must pass a Charisma + Willpower (4) Test in order to purposefully deceive others.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice pool modifer when casting Sun- or Fire-based spells.
Adept: Gain 3 free levels of Temperature Tolerance

mentor.name: Dark King
mentor.advantage: All: +2 dice to Intimidation tests.
mentor.disadvantage: Followers receive a –1 dice pool penalty when resisting physical damage.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice to Contractual Rituals.
Adept: Gain Spirit Ram for free.

mentor.name: Moon
mentor.advantage: All: +2 dice to Negotiation tests.
mentor.disadvantage: Followers of Moon must make a Charisma + Willpower (4) Test in order to engage in direct confrontation; failure means they cannot make any action considered as such. Negotiation is not considered confrontation (Moon loves discussion), but arguments fall into that category.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice for Illusion and transformation-focused Manipulation spells, preparations, and spell rituals.
Adept: Gain 3 levels of Stillness for free.

mentor.name: Oak
mentor.advantage: All: +1 to Damage Resistance tests.
mentor.disadvantage: Must have a natural (meaning unaugmented) Body and Strength of 4 or greater to select this mentor spirit.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice pool bonus when summoning plant or air spirits (choose 1 when selecting this mentor spirit).
Adept: Gain 2 levels of Stillness for free

mentor.name: Stag
mentor.advantage: All: +2 to Blades tests.
mentor.disadvantage: Followers of the Stag demand respect, especially to those they give it to. Once disrespected, they must succeed in a Charisma + Willpower (3) Test, or they will demand satisfaction against the slight.

choice.name: Magician: +2 to summoning earth spirits.
Adept: Gain +2 levels of Light Body for free.

mentor.name: Great Mother
mentor.advantage: All: When not in an urban area, gain +1 to any skill test with skills in the Outdoors skill group.
mentor.disadvantage: Treat any background count due to pollution or twisted element as twice the actual rating.

choice.name: Magician: +2 for health spells, preparations, and spell rituals.
Adept: Gain Empathic Healing for free.

mentor.name: Spider (Alt)
mentor.advantage: All: +2 dice pool modifer for tests using the Stealth skill group.
mentor.disadvantage: When not following a plan or a plan doesn’t go according to plan, followers of Spider must pass a Charisma + Willpower (4) Test or suffer –2 to all rolls until a new plan is established.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice pool modifer when casting Manipulation spells, preparations, and rituals
Adept: Gain 2 free levels of Spirit Claw (although in this case, it manifests as a fang).

mentor.name: Wolf (Alt)
mentor.advantage: All: +1 dice pool modifer for tests using the Sneaking, Perception, Survival, and Tracking skills.
mentor.disadvantage: Whenever a follower of Wolf sees an opportunity to survive by attacking or sacrifcing the weak, they must pass a Charisma + Willpower (4) Test or attempt to seize the opportunity. This does not apply to those the Wolf considers friends or family.

choice.name: Magician: +1 dice pool modifer when casting Combat spells, preparations, and rituals.
Adept: Gain 2 free levels of Danger Sense.

mentor.name: Rat (Alt)
mentor.advantage: All: +1 dice pool modifer for tests using the Perception and Sneaking skills.
mentor.disadvantage: Followers of Rat cannot receive aid or aid others with a Teamwork test unless they trust the individuals they are teaming with. Further, if they do trust the individuals, but that trust is broken through incompetence or betrayal, they must pass a Charisma + Willpower (4) Test to be able to use teamwork with that individual each time in the future.

choice.name: Magician: +1 dice pool modifer when casting Health spells, preparations, and rituals
Adept: Gain 1 free level of Analytics.

mentor.name: Eurasian Jay
mentor.advantage: All: +1 dice pool modifer for tests using the Perception and Palming skills.
mentor.disadvantage: Eurasian Jay loves to split his posessions. If a follower of Eurasian Jay receives a splittable reward, she must make a Charisma + Willpower (3) test to not spread the reward over different accounts or rooms.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice pool modifer when casting Illusion spells, preparations, and rituals
Magician: +2 dice pool modifer when casting Manipulation spells, preparations, and rituals
Adept: Gain 1 free level of Voice Control.
Adept: Gain 2 free levels of Danger Sense.

mentor.name: Squirrel
mentor.advantage: All: +2 dice pool modifer for tests using the Gymnastics skill.
mentor.disadvantage: When followers of Squirrel are in confined spaces, they must make a Willpower + Chrisma (3) Tests or take a -1 dice pool modifier on all tests while feeling cramped.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice pool modifer when casting Detection spells, preparations, and rituals
Adept: Gain 2 free levels of Light Body.

mentor.name: Fox
mentor.advantage: All: +2 dice pool modifer for tests using the Perception skill.
mentor.disadvantage: If Fox fights, it'll fight to kill. A follower of this mentor spirit must make a Willpower + Charisma (3) Test to spare a bettered foe.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice pool modifer when casting Illusion spells, preparations, and rituals
Adept: Gain 2 free levels of Combat Sense.

mentor.name: Tide
mentor.advantage: All: +2 dice pool modifer for tests using the Ritual Spellcasting skill.
mentor.disadvantage: Followers of Tide live in transition, but in the consistency of a cycle. They also design their lives this way. If their normal life cycle is lastingly impaired by Sleep deprivation or illness, they suffer a -1 dice pool modifier on all tests until the cycle is restored.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice summoning spirits of water or earth (The type of spirit for which this bonus applies changes every 6 hours).
Adept: Gain 2 free levels of Heightened Concentration.

mentor.name: Heinzelmännchen
mentor.advantage: All: +2 dice pool modifer for tests using the Artisan skill and the Engineering skill group.
mentor.disadvantage: Heinzelmännchen works in secret. If a follower of Heinzelmännchen wants to perform magic in public or under close observation, they'll have to make a Willpower + Charisma (3) Test or else their magic cease to function for the moment.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice pool modifer when casting Manipulation spells, preparations, and rituals
Adept: Gain 1 free level of Improved Ability (Artisan or a skill from the Engineering group).

mentor.name: Groundhog
mentor.advantage: All: +1 dice pool modifer for tests using the Perception and Etiquette skills.
mentor.disadvantage: If a follower of Grounghog get into a fight (intentionally or unintentionally), they'll have to make a Willpower + Chraisma (3) Test to not flee immediately.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice pool modifer when casting Detection spells, preparations, and rituals
Adept: Gain 2 free levels of Attribute Boost (Reaction).
Adept: Gain the Motion Sense power for free.

mentor.name: Seal
mentor.advantage: All: +2 dice pool modifer for Judge Intentions tests.
mentor.disadvantage: Seal has compassion, but she is lacking in tact dealing with the feelings of others. Whenever a follower of Seal gains insight into the emotional world of an other, it's difficult for him to respect private boundaries and not address the subject. In order to remain discreet in such situations, they must make a Charisma + Willpower (3) test. Glitches in social test are automatically critical.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice summoning spirits of water.
Magician: +2 dice pool modifer when casting Illusion spells, preparations, and rituals
Adept: Gain the Astral Perception Power for free.

mentor.name: Pig
mentor.advantage: All: +2 dice pool modifer for tests using the Con skill.
mentor.disadvantage: A follower of Pig must make a Willpower + Charisma (3) Test to break free from pleasurable activities like sleeping, eating, drinking or consuming drugs.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice pool modifer when casting Manipulation spells, preparations, and rituals
Adept: Gain 1 free level of Improved Ability for a skill from the Influence or Acting group.

mentor.name: Capricorn
mentor.advantage: All: +2 dice pool modifer for tests using the Gymnastics skill.
mentor.disadvantage: Capricorn may not be stubborn, but he decides and acts quickly. He has neither tolerance nor time for hesitation. If a follower of Capricorn is confronted with long decision-making processes, discussions, or indecision, he must make a Charisma + Willpower (3) test in order not to immediately choose the in his opinion best decision available and to put it into practice immediately.

choice.name: Magician: +2 dice summoning spirits of earth.
Adept: 2 free levels of Hang Time.

mentor.name: Wild Hunt
mentor.advantage: All: +2 dice pool modifer for tests using the Pilot Ground Craft or Intimidation skill.
mentor.disadvantage: A follower of the Wild Hunt always leaves behind a swath of devastation. If objects or uninvolved persons could be harmed in the fight, he wouldn't take any consideration. If a follower of the Wild Hunt is consciously considerate in the fight, he must succeed in a Charisma + Willpower (3) test, otherwise he is so inhibited that he suffers a -2 dicepool modifier on all actions.
